reviewText:
not only does he explain the math concepts really well using words but he also uses physical objects to help the viewer understand better.

it really challenges your intuition

if you are a math nerd, you will love it. even if you are not there is a lot of interesting things you will learn.

example of challenging intuition. what is the average mileage of 2 cars (20 miles per gallon and 30 miles per gallon) traveling the same distance? if you think it's 25 mpg, you are wrong. watch lecture 2 for an explanation.
